about_the_game:
Welcome to NextBuild, a car building and racing game created by car enthusiast, for car enthusiasts. This game is not just about building and racing cars, it's about the journey, the passion, and the challenges of real-world car building. Dive into an authentic experience where creativity meets complexity, and every decision matters. From the garage to the track, NextBuild is designed to test your skills, patience, and resourcefulness.

Car Building

In NextBuild, building your dream car is as exciting as it is challenging:

  • Realistic Mechanics: Modify every detail of your car, from the engine block to the suspension. But beware, just like in real life, things can go wrong! Expect blown engines, overheating, or parts failing under stress.

  • Hard-to-Find Parts: Not everything comes easy. Track down rare components, deal with limited budgets, and outsmart competitors to create your perfect build.

  • Authenticity First: This isn’t arcade-style tuning. Real-world physics and mechanical accuracy mean you’ll feel the joy and frustration of true car customization.

  • Visual Customization: Beyond performance, craft your car’s identity with body works, decals, rims, and more.

World

Step into an open-world environment designed to mirror the real-life struggles and triumphs of car enthusiasts:

  • Dynamic Economy: Manage your finances carefully. Earn money through jobs, races, challenges, and side gigs, but be prepared for setbacks like costly repairs or limited cash flow.

  • Car Junkyards: Hunt through abandoned junkyards for hidden treasures. Salvage rare cars,  parts and forgotten gems to bring your builds to life.

  • Abandoned Garages: Purchase old, rundown garages and explore their contents. Who knows what rare or unique parts you might uncover in the dust?

  • Diverse Environments: Race through urban streets, twisty mountain passes, or dangerous forest. Each location comes with unique challenges and opportunities.

Built by car lovers, for car lovers, NextBuild represents the raw, unfiltered reality of car building.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX3070 or Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
